name: Witch Hunter Di - To the Rescue!
name_original: Witch Hunter Di - To the Rescue!
description:
In this game, you must guide Di in order to climb a tower full of warriors and rescue Koda!

HOW TO PLAY:

Move: Either WASD or the Arrow Keys

Attack: You attack by moving into enemies

Spinning Attack: Press Z to attack all enemies around Di. Costs 1 MP

Magic Trap: Press X to leave a magic trap on your square. It will paralyze enemies in a 3x3 area for a few turns when triggered. Costs 3 MP

Slow Time: Press C to paralyze enemies for 6-10 turns. Costs 4 MP

Shards: Press 1, 2, 3 or 4 to activate the corresponding shard

Zoom: Press Numpad + - or / to Zoom in, out and reset zoom

Reset: Hold Ctrl to reset

You recover MP by killing enemies

You recover HP with Pizza and Watermelons you consume

You level up every 500XP, which increases your stats and fully heals HP and MP

Clear 10 floors to finish the game
